title: Tutorial: How To Use Publisher Rocket For Researching Categories And Keywords
description:
If you self-publish on Amazon, you need to add categories and keywords onto your book. The choice can make a difference in how easily your book is found. You can also use keywords for Amazon ads. 
In this tutorial, I'll show you how I use Publisher Rocket. 

I go through:
How to research different country stores, formats, or languages
How to research categories — for fiction and non-fiction
How to research keywords — for fiction and non-fiction
How to research keywords for your Amazon Ads

I'm an affiliate of Publisher Rocket, because I think it's a fantastic tool. So you can use my link, https://www.TheCreativePenn.com/rocket 
if you want to have a look or you can just go to PublisherRocket directly. If you buy through my link, I will receive a percentage of the sale at no extra cost to you. Thank you!

Transcript and notes here: https://www.thecreativepenn.com/tutorial-publisher-rocket/
